name: Wikipedia Paper — sidebar edition
description:
a lightweight, open-spaced theme for Wikipedia optimized for simplicity and legibility. This version places the table of contents in a sidebar for easy, always-available navigation. Fonts used:
  • AquilineTwo
    • for titles.
  • Open Sans
    • for body text.
